All publishing bundles include 3 years of membership & maintenance

Want more? Try Global Premium

Global Premium

Membership & maintenance benefits

Unlock these exclusive membership benefits with any plan

Royalties
  • We’ll manage your royalties  and reports.
  • Transparent royalty management  from the very first day.
  • 70% of royalties eligible  starting from 2nd year.
Marketing
  • Access our marketing tool to manage  and track campaign performance.
  • Receive marketing support and training from our experts.
  • Access Spines Academy – expert  insights to ensure your book’s success.
Distribution
  • Distribution to dozens of channels including Amazon and more.
  • Personal landing page with your  author bio and book details.
  • Metadata optimization.
Keep in mind

Contact us to extend your membership and enjoy six years of marketing and distribution benefits, plus receive your files as soon as production is complete.

Comparison table

Compare the features across all plans and find the right one for your journey.

Frequently Asked Questions

What pricing plan is right for me?

Spines offers several publishing plans so you can choose the one that best fits your needs.

  • Signature Plan – For authors who want their book available in multiple formats (softcover, hardcover, eBook, and audiobook) with added guidance during the publishing process.
  • Paramount Plan – For manuscripts over 100,000 words or for authors who want to publish in two languages (English plus one other). Includes extended production support.
  • Horizon Plan – For authors who want a more comprehensive publishing process. Includes additional editing services, plus marketing support and higher-level service throughout production.
  • Global Premium Plan – For authors seeking a premium global publishing option. Includes translation into six languages, global distribution across 100 platforms, and additional marketing visibility.
What payment methods can I use?

Spines offers multiple secure payment options:

  • Pay securely with your credit or debit card (all major cards accepted).
  • Pay directly from your bank account via ACH transfer.
  • Check out quickly and securely with PayPal.
  • Split your purchase into up to 24 monthly payments with Affirm (subject to approval).
If I choose a monthly payment plan, do I need to finish all payments before Spines starts working on my book?

No. We begin the publishing process as soon as your first installment is paid.

Can I try Spines for free?

Yes! You can try a basic service level at no cost. Create a free account by clicking the “Get Started” button at the top of our website.

What other services do you offer?

In addition to the publishing plans and add-ons listed above, Spines also offers expert illustration, document conversion, and ghostwriting services. For writers who need help with their manuscripts, we also offer writing coaching services. To learn more, contact our publishing consultants here.

What plan is right for me?

The Paramount plan is our most popular option because it combines all of Spines’ publishing tools with multiple publishing formats. With this plan, your manuscript will be published as a softcover, hardcover, eBook, and audiobook in English, plus one translated version in a language of your choice. You’ll also receive weekly check-ins with your account manager and enjoy distribution across dozens of global platforms.

That said, the right plan also depends on your publishing goals. If you’re publishing a single title and want the widest reach in multiple formats, Paramount is often the best fit. But if you’re planning to publish several titles or prefer to handle marketing independently, another plan may be a better match. Our team is here to help you choose the option that makes the most sense for your journey.

What if I change my mind?

We’re confident that once you experience Spines, you’ll see why thousands of authors have published their books with us. However, if you decide it isn’t right for you, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee.
